entry.title: Frictionless Data Community Call May 2023
entry.summary: At our last community call Augusto Herrmann presented FastETL, a free and open source software library for Apache Airflow that makes it easier to integrate heterogeneous data sources and to publish open data...

entry.title: Frictionless Data at csv,conf,v7
entry.summary: On April 19, 20 we attended csv,conf,v7, the best community conference for datamakers from all around the world!

entry.title: Frictionless Data Community Call April 2023
entry.summary: At our last community call Keith Hughitt shared with the communities some ideas on how we can improve the support for non-tabular data...

entry.title: Frictionless Data Community Call March 2023
entry.summary: At our last community call Evgeny Karev presented the new Frictionless CLI commands and we talked with the community about project governance...
